job details

job summary:

WHAT YOU WILL WORK ON

You'll be working with members of the Legal & Contracts Engineering team to deliver a premium user experience integrated with legal data platform enriched with our AI capabilities to enhance the way we do business. You will translate design documents into pixel perfect views and develop ReactJS components that serve the technical and non-technical stakeholder requirements, adhering to enterprise standards and seamlessly integrating with the broader  ecosystem. Core accountabilities of this job include:


Participating in architectural design sessions with the team's engineers
Convert business requirements into reusable ReactJS components
Translate design specifications to pixel perfect views using ReactJS, Typescript and SCSS
Implement accessibility features according to  ADA standards
Implement deployment pipelines using  CI/CD (Jenkins and Github Actions) for static website hosting
Assist in the task breakdown to convert designs into development tasks
Participate in engineer code reviews via GitHub
Mentor junior engineers through co-development practices such as pair programming


WHO YOU WILL WORK WITH

You will work closely with business stakeholders, product owners, leadership, and your peers within the engineering team to ensure the successful delivery of the software. Additionally, you will work with other technology teams that lead the up and down stream solutions to coordinate dependencies.

WHAT YOU BRING

To make it clear, we're not looking for just anyone. We're looking for someone special, someone who had these experiences and clearly demonstrated these skills:


Bachelor degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, Engineering, or related field or equivalent combination of education and experience
5+ years using design specifications to develop views using HTML/HTML5 and CSS/SCSS/SASS
Experience with common front-end development tools such as Yarn, NPM, Node, etc.
Familiarity with popular Global State management packages for such as Redux, Flux and React Context
Experience with various build tools and website hosting patterns
Experience integrating websites with various REST APIs
Experience with common front-end development tools such as Babel, Webpack, NPM, etc.
Familiarity with popular ReactJS workflows (Flux, Redux)
Familiarity with newer specifications of EcmaScript
Experience working with business stakeholders and product managers to drive requirements and delivery
Experience in an Agile or Scrum development environment, including a demonstrated ability to deliver software applications in this environment
Proven ability to deliver highly integrated software applications with complex dependencies
Proven experience as a member of a large project / project team
Outstanding collaboration, listening, written and verbal communication skills
High tolerance for ambiguity and changing priorities
